original_text: God chose me as his apostle, to tell this same message to people. I am telling you what is true. I am not telling lies! Yes, he sent me to teach his true message to the Gentiles, so that they would believe in him.
korean_text: 이를 위하여 내가 전파하는 자와 사도로 세움을 입은 것은 참말이요 거짓말이 아니니 믿음과 진리 안에서 내가 이방인의 스승이 되었노라

sentences.original_text: God chose me as his apostle
to tell this same message to people
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들에게 이 동일한 메시지를 전달하기 위해

sentences.original_text: I am telling you what is true
to teach his true message to the Gentiles
sentences.korean_translation: 이방인들에게 그분의 진실한 메시지를 가르치기 위해

sentences.original_text: so that they would believe in him
